lines.text: read n then s then s2

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: x = int with x = s [ i ] - 48
y = int with y = s2 [ i ] - 48
if y > x then swap x and y
lines.code: if ( y > x ) swap ( x , y ) ;

lines.text: increment ans by min of absolute of ( x - y ) , min of ( ( 10 - x ) + y ) , ( x + y )
lines.code: ans += min ( abs ( x - y ) , min ( ( ( 10 - x ) + y ) , ( x + y ) ) ) ;
